default.description: Default settings with balanced quality and performance

comic.description: Optimized for comic books with line art and text

photo.description: Higher quality settings for photographic content

maximum_compression.description: Prioritizes file size reduction over perfect quality

maximum_quality.description: Highest quality settings for minimal quality loss

phone_friendly.description: Optimized for mobile devices with resolution limits

manga.description: Optimized for manga with text enhancement and size limits for e-readers

e_ink.description: Optimized for e-ink readers (like Kindle) with enhanced contrast

fast_conversion.description: Fastest conversion settings with acceptable quality

tiny.description: Maximum compression with size limits for very small files
